text:
steps to reproduce:

create a new document.
delete the document.
you will find an empty content/<area>/<uuid> directory.

text:
This should be handled by the ContentJanitor. Maybe it is not invoked correctly
in all cases. Would you mind attaching a test case?
If the problem persists, please reopen (and attach a test case if possible).
